mapper.select: SELECT m.signid,u.username,m.signtime,m.signtag,m.signdesc,d.departname,b.branchshortname FROM manualsign m JOIN userinfo u ON m.userid =u.userid JOIN departinfo d ON u.departid=d.departid JOIN branchinfo b ON b.branchid=d.branchid WHERE DATE(m.signtime)=DATE(NOW()) limit #{page},#{limit}
